name: Guerrero Curtis
comment: I'm a fan of apple products and I like almost everything about this new MBA. But it has one huge flaw that nobody talks about. It's the camera hardware and it hasn't been updated in ages.

name: Lynn Hale
comment: UPDATE 12-15-2020 - After three weeks, I'm still really impressed with the M1 MacBook Air/8 Core CPU/8 Core GPU/512 SSD/8GB RAM. --- My updated plea: MAKE SURE YOU GET AS MUCH MEMORY

name: Santos Elliott
comment: Beautiful laptop. I’ve upgraded from the MacBook Air of old...so far this laptop has blown it away. It wasn’t overly pricey to be honest and I feel it’s worth the price. Overall look is great and keyboard feel is nice.

name: Stafford Mccoy
comment: I have two MacBook Airs (MBA), a 13 and a 11, both with the previous form factor (the wide, body colored bezel around the screen, 1280x800 resolution) and this new 13 MBA improves.

name: Lila Baldwin
comment: No complains so far. Very fast and performs great. I had a 2014 MacBook Air and finally upgraded this year. This is leagues beyond that entry and I’m very happy with this upgrade.

name: Mable Osborn
comment: Os vendedores não deixam isso muito claro, mas os Macs são , ou seja, recondicionados (pela Apple). Por isso os preços mais atraentes.
